name: Interface DirectoryStream.Filter<T>
text:
An interface that is implemented by objects that decide if a directory
 entry should be accepted or filtered. A Filter is passed as the
 parameter to the Files.newDirectoryStream(Path,DirectoryStream.Filter)
 method when opening a directory to iterate over the entries in the
 directory.

methods.description: Decides if the given directory entry should be accepted or filtered.
